hadiths.text: Malik b. al-Huwairith said:I saw the Prophet (ﷺ) raise his hands when he uttered the takbir (Allah is most great), when he bowed and when he raised his head after bowing until he brought them to the lobes of his ears

chapter.eng-name: Those Who Mentioned That He Should Raise His Hands After Standing Up After Two Rak'ah
